org.libav.avformat

Interface IStreamWrapper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IWrapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStreamWrapper, StreamWrapper53, StreamWrapper54

    public interface IStreamWrapper
extends IWrapper
    Wrapper for the AVStream. It provides access to some of the AVStream properties.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.libav.bridge.IWrapper

        clearWrapperCache, getPointer, rebind

    • Method Detail

      • free

        void free()
        Free the allocated resources. WARNING: DO NOT call this if you have not allocated the stream (using the FormatContextWrapper newStream() method). If you call this method, you must null the corresponding field of the streams array in the format context.

      • getCodecContext

        ICodecContextWrapper getCodecContext()
        Get the codec property from the AVStream. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        codec context

      • setCodecContext

        void setCodecContext(ICodecContextWrapper codecContext)
        Set the codec property of the AVStream. The value may be cached.
        Parameters:
        codecContext - a codec context

      • getIndex

        int getIndex()
        Get the index property from the AVStream. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        stream index

      • getSampleAspectRatio

        Rational getSampleAspectRatio()
        Get the sample_aspect_ratio property from the AVStream. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        aspect ratio

      • setSampleAspectRatio

        void setSampleAspectRatio(Rational aspectRatio)
        Set the sample_aspect_ratio property of the AVStream. The value may be cached.
        Parameters:
        aspectRatio -

      • getRFrameRate

        Rational getRFrameRate()
        Get the r_frame_rate property from the AVStream. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        real base frame rate

      • getTimeBase

        Rational getTimeBase()
        Get the time_base property from the AVStream. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        time base

      • setTimeBase

        void setTimeBase(Rational timeBase)
        Set the time_base property of the AVStream. The value may be cached.
        Parameters:
        timeBase - a time base

      • getFrameCount

        long getFrameCount()
        Get the nb_frames property from the AVStream. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        number of frames

      • getDuration

        long getDuration()
        Get the duration property from the AVStream. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        stream duration

      • getDisposition

        int getDisposition()
        Get the disposition property from the AVStream. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        stream disposition

      • getMetadata

        IDictionaryWrapper getMetadata()
        Get the metadata property from the AVStream. WARNING: The returned value may be cached. Call the clearWrapperCahce() if you think the value have been changed.
        Returns:
        stream metadata
